mapper.select: select * from member_test where email like #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into member_test(num, email, pw, name, gender, hp, hpopen, birthday, address, talentDt, talentGet) values(member_sq.nextval,#{email},#{pw},#{name},#{gender},#{hp},#{hpopen},#{birthday},#{address},#{talentDt},#{talentGet})
mapper.select: select * from member_test where name=#{name} and hp=#{hp}
select * from member_test where email=#{email} and name=#{name} and hp=#{hp}
